casebody.data:
Michael MUNOZ and Amy Munoz, Plaintiffs and Appellants,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., Wells Fargo N.A., and its Subsidiary Wells Fargo Home Mortgage, Defendants and Appellees. DA 18-0018 Supreme Court of Montana. Submitted on Briefs: December 12, 2018
Decided: January 15, 2019

Affirmed.
